title: Puraavai Vandhu Pogiraai Lyrics Sevarkkodi Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Singer: Vijay Prakash
Song: Puraavai
Movie: Sevarkkodi
Lyrics: Vairamuthu
Music :C Sathya


Naan Thaedinen ..voh voh ..
Naan Thaedinen.


Puraavai vandhu pogiraai,karaarai kadhal seigirai
Oru mega idukil mazhayai pola ozhindhu kolkirai
Nan minnal pola thaedi parthum padhungi kolkirai
Indre thaan mannil vandhaai.. oh oh oh .....
Anbe unnai.. kandaen adi, aasai vazhi.. kondaen adi


Unnai thaedatha saalai illai
Thaedi odaatha solari illai
Kaattru poi sollvadhu ilai illai 
kadhil en kadhil thagaval illai


Unnai enni enni, jeevan oolarum podhum
Chinna maranam thondra thunbam kollum. oh ohh...
Neyum ennai pola thuditha thudipai kettu,
Nenjam konjam konjam inbam kollum
En punne unnaku punnagaya,
En thunbam kondadum rasigai neeya..
Oh h oh.....


Nee illaye suraavali, 
Nee vandhadhaal deepavali..
Puraavai vandhu pogiraai,karaarai kadhal seigirai


Neeyum enpola aasai kondum,
Nenjai thundaga thooki vaithaai..
Nanum nandaaga oorndhu vandhu,
Nenjai thundaaga thooki chendren


Bakthan thaedi thaedi,nitham alayum podhum
Kadavul neril vandhu nindrathum illai
Unnai thaedi thaedi, indru kandu kondaen
Unmai kadhal pola kadavul illai
Un kannil enadhu kanmaniya,
En vazhvin marupaadhi neye neeya.. 
oho ho oh....


Nee illaye suraavali, 
Nee vandhadhaal deepavali..
Puraavai vandhu pogiraai,karaarai kadhal seigirai
